entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Iqaluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:19 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -35.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Iqaluit Airport 08:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -35.2°C

Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -44
Dewpoint: -38.5°C

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 39 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. Temperature falling to minus 39 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 53 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 43. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 39.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 39. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
